actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend for a three-year period the duty on a certain chemical intermediate.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1986, the duty on a certain chemical intermediate, (6R, 7R)-7-((R)-2-Amino-2- phenylacetamido)-3-methyl-8-oxo-5-thia-1-azabicyclo (4.2.0) oct-2-ene-2-carboxylic acid disolvate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend for a three-year period the duty on a certain chemical intermediate.
